titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to Master Iohn De Albines, notable discourse against heresies (as his frendes call his booke) compiled by Thomas Spark pastor of Blechley in the county of Buck
titleStmt.author: Sparke, Thomas, 1548-1616.
Albin de Valsergues, Jean d', d. 1566. Marques de la vraye église catholique. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: A reprinting of and reply to "A notable discourse" by Jean d'Albin de Valsergues (Douai, 1575), a translation of: Marques de la vraye église catholique.
Includes index and a final errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
